description: i-Blason (TM) Logo Bearing BookShell hard back design leather case stand for Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 Tablet Designed specifically for Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 Inch Tablet 16GB 32GB 3G 4G Wifi Versions Snap closure to safely secure your device The HardBack provides functionality and protection with the all in one design, folder style case. The HardBack features a stylish and professional looking faux leather exterior The back cover safely holds your Transformer in place with place holders that latch on to the sides of the tablet. The Hardback offers multiple stand positions and viewing options with the roll back cover, and interior spines Soft microfiber interior lining offers anti-slip protection when roll back cover is in typing position, and adds much needed scratch protection for your screen Ports, buttons, and camera is perfectly exposed for un-hindered use while your Galaxy Note 10.1 ablet is protected Converts into a multi-angle stand with the groves in the case i-Blason Guaranteed ONE YEAR limited Warranty
title: i-Blason Folio Stand case Cover for Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 Inch Tablet N8000 N8010 16GB 32GB 3G 4G Wifi Version AT&T Android 4.0 with Built-in Stand ( Black)
